EmailTemplate.textOnly:
RaagviTech Company
Dear Raghav, {!Access__c.OwnerFullName} is Requesting For Following Access: Upgrade Profile to : {!Access__c.Profile_to_Update__c}, Permission Set : {!Access__c.Permission_to_Update__c}.
The Estimation time for the Access :{!Access__c.Access_Expire_Date__c} , {!Access__c.Access_Expire_Time__c}. Thank you, RaagviTech Company
